name: Tombs of Old Sol
description:
A PICO-8 demake of the classic arcade game Tutankham, devourer of many quarters; transferred to a sword & planet setting inspired by Leigh Brackett. This was my first PICO-8 project, and the first arcade-style thing I have written in many, many moons; there are some rough spots, no doubt, but on the whole I enjoy playing it, and I hope you will too.

  • Move horizontally or vertically with arrow keys
  • Your laser (Z) shoots left and right
  • You get one flash bomb (X) per life or level; this kills all enemies
  • Collect treasure (coins and gems)
  • Artifacts are used to open the door(s) to a teleporter which will take you to the next level
  • Any artifact you have in hand when you go through the teleporter gives bonus points
  • Extra life at 10,000, then 20,000, 40,000 etc.
  • Hit Enter to pause game and bring up menu

Many thanks to the denizens of the Whetstone Sword & Sorcery Discord server, for inspiration and encouragement.
